trans-unit.source: Provides services for managing the queue of work items for a thread.
trans-unit.target: Fornece serviços para gerenciar a fila de itens de trabalho para um thread.

trans-unit.source: The Dispatcher maintains a prioritized queue of work items for a specific thread.
trans-unit.target: O Dispatcher mantém uma fila com prioridade de itens de trabalho para um segmento específico.

trans-unit.source: When a Dispatcher is created on a thread, it becomes the only Dispatcher that can be associated with the thread, even if the Dispatcher is shut down.
trans-unit.target: Quando um Dispatcher é criado em um thread, ele se torna o Dispatcher único que pode ser associado ao thread, mesmo se o distribuidor é desligado.

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to get the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CurrentDispatcher%2A> for the current thread and a Dispatcher is not associated with the thread, a Dispatcher will be created.
trans-unit.target: Se você tentar obter o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CurrentDispatcher%2A>para o thread atual e um distribuidor não está associado com o segmento, será criado um Dispatcher.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CurrentDispatcher%2A>

trans-unit.source: A Dispatcher is also created when you create a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>.
trans-unit.target: Um Dispatcher também é criado quando você cria um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>

trans-unit.source: If you create a Dispatcher on a background thread, be sure to shut down the dispatcher before exiting the thread.
trans-unit.target: Se você criar um distribuidor em um thread em segundo plano, certifique-se de desligar o distribuidor antes de encerrar o thread.

trans-unit.source: If a Dispatcher is shut down, it cannot be restarted.
trans-unit.target: Se um Dispatcher está desligado, ele não pode ser reiniciado.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> can only be accessed by the Dispatcher it is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Em [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>só pode ser acessado pelo Dispatcher está associado.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>

trans-unit.source: For example, a background thread cannot update the contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> that is associated with the Dispatcher on the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] thread.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um thread em segundo plano não é possível atualizar o conteúdo de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>que está associado com o distribuidor no [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] thread.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: In order for the background thread to access the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, the background thread must delegate the work to the Dispatcher associated with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] thread.
trans-unit.target: Para que o thread em segundo plano acessar o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, thread em segundo plano deve delegar o trabalho para o distribuidor associado a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] thread.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is accomplished by using either <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Isso é feito por meio de um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> is synchronous and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> is asynchronous.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A>é síncrono e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>é assíncrona.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A></xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: The operation is added to the queue of the Dispatcher at the specified <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>.
trans-unit.target: A operação é adicionada à fila do Dispatcher em <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority> especificado

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> is called on a Dispatcher that has shut down, the status property of the returned <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>for chamado em um Dispatcher que foi desligado, a propriedade status da retornado <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation>é definida como <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus>.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: All of the methods on Dispatcher, with the exception of <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.DisableProcessing%2A>, are free-threaded.
trans-unit.target: Todos os métodos no distribuidor, com exceção do <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.DisableProcessing%2A>, são free-thread.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.DisableProcessing%2A>

trans-unit.source: Objects that derive from <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> have thread affinity.
trans-unit.target: Objetos que derivam de <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>têm afinidade de thread.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>

trans-unit.source: Objects that derive from <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> are free-threaded when they are frozen.
trans-unit.target: Objetos que derivam de <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>são free-thread quando eles estão congelados.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [visão geral de objetos Freezable](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Executes the specified delegate asynchronously with the specified arguments on the thread that the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref> was created on.
trans-unit.target: Executa o delegado especificado assincronamente com os argumentos especificados no thread que o <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"> </xref> foi criado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> object returned by <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> can be used in several ways to interact with the specified delegate, such as: - Changing the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority> of the delegate as it is pending execution in the event queue.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation>objeto retornado por <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>pode ser usado de várias maneiras para interagir com o delegado especificado, tais como: - alteração de <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>do representante que está pendente execução na fila de eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation>

trans-unit.source: - Removing the delegate from the event queue.
trans-unit.target: -Removendo o representante da fila de eventos.

trans-unit.source: - Waiting for the delegate to return.
trans-unit.target: -Aguardando o representante retornar.

trans-unit.source: - Obtaining the value that the delegate returns after it is executed.
trans-unit.target: -Obtendo o valor que retorna o representante após ele é executado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> is asynchronous; therefore, control returns immediately to the calling object after it is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>é assíncrono; Portanto, o controle retorna imediatamente para o objeto de chamada depois que ele é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], only the thread that created a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> may access that object.
trans-unit.target: Em [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], somente o thread que criou um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>pode acessar esse objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>

trans-unit.source: For example, a background thread that is spun off from the main UI thread cannot update the contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> that was created on the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um thread em segundo plano que é será levado do thread da interface do usuário principal não é possível atualizar o conteúdo de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>que foi criado no thread da interface do usuário.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: In order for the background thread to access the Content property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, the background thread must delegate the work to the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> associated with the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: Para que o thread em segundo plano acessar a propriedade Content a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, thread em segundo plano deve delegar o trabalho para o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>associado ao thread de interface do usuário.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: This is accomplished by using either <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Isso é feito por meio de um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: The operation is added to the event queue of the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> at the specified <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>.
trans-unit.target: A operação é adicionada à fila de eventos de <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>em especificado <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> is called on a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> that has shut down, the status property of the returned <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>for chamado em um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>que foi desligado, a propriedade status da retornado <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation>é definida como <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus>.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: The delegate to a method that takes parameters specified in `args`, which is pushed onto the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref> event queue.
trans-unit.target: O representante para um método que usa os parâmetros especificados na `args`, que é passado para o <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"> </xref> fila de eventos.

trans-unit.source: An array of objects to pass as arguments to the given method.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de objetos para passar como argumentos para o método especificado.

trans-unit.source: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: An object, which is returned immediately after <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke*> is called, that can be used to interact with the delegate as it is pending execution in the event queue.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto, que é retornado imediatamente após <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke*>é chamado, que pode ser usado para interagir com o delegado como está aguardando a execução de eventos fila.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke*>

trans-unit.source: Executes the specified delegate asynchronously at the specified priority on the thread the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Executa o delegado especificado assíncrona na prioridade especificada no thread de <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"> </xref> está associado.

trans-unit.source: If multiple BeginInvoke calls are made at the same <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>, they will be executed in the order the calls were made.
trans-unit.target: Se várias chamadas BeginInvoke são feitas no mesmo <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>, elas serão executadas na ordem em que as chamadas feitas.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> returns a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> object that can be used to interact with the delegate when the delegate is in the event queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>Retorna um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation>objeto que pode ser usado para interagir com o delegado quando o representante de eventos é fila.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation></xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: The delegate to a method that takes parameters specified in `args`, which is pushed onto the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref> event queue.
trans-unit.target: O representante para um método que usa os parâmetros especificados na `args`, que é passado para o <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"> </xref> fila de eventos.

trans-unit.source: The priority, relative to the other pending operations in the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref> event queue, the specified method is invoked.
trans-unit.target: A prioridade, em relação a outras operações pendentes no <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"> </xref> fila de eventos, o método especificado é invocada.

trans-unit.source: An array of objects to pass as arguments to the given method.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de objetos para passar como argumentos para o método especificado.

trans-unit.source: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: An object, which is returned immediately after <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke*> is called, that can be used to interact with the delegate as it is pending execution in the event queue.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto, que é retornado imediatamente após <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke*>é chamado, que pode ser usado para interagir com o delegado como está aguardando a execução de eventos fila.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke*>

trans-unit.source: Executes the specified delegate asynchronously at the specified priority and with the specified argument on the thread the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Executa o delegado especificado assíncrona na prioridade especificada e com o argumento especificado no thread de <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"> </xref> está associado.

trans-unit.source: `Arg` can be `null` if no arguments are needed.
trans-unit.target: `Arg`pode ser `null` se nenhum argumento é necessário.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> returns a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> object that can be used to interact with the delegate when the delegate is in the event queue.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>Retorna um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation>objeto que pode ser usado para interagir com o delegado quando o representante de eventos é fila.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation></xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> object returned by <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> can be used in several ways to interact with the specified delegate, such as: - Changing the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority> of the delegate as it is pending execution in the event queue.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation>objeto retornado por <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>pode ser usado de várias maneiras para interagir com o delegado especificado, tais como: - alteração de <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>do representante que está pendente execução na fila de eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation>

trans-unit.source: - Removing the delegate from the event queue.
trans-unit.target: -Removendo o representante da fila de eventos.

trans-unit.source: - Waiting for the delegate to return.
trans-unit.target: -Aguardando o representante retornar.

trans-unit.source: - Obtaining the value that the delegate returns after it is executed.
trans-unit.target: -Obtendo o valor que retorna o representante após ele é executado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> is asynchronous; therefore, control returns immediately to the calling object after it is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>é assíncrono; Portanto, o controle retorna imediatamente para o objeto de chamada depois que ele é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], only the thread that created a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> may access that object.
trans-unit.target: Em [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], somente o thread que criou um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>pode acessar esse objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>

trans-unit.source: For example, a background thread that is spun off from the main UI thread cannot update the contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> that was created on the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um thread em segundo plano que é será levado do thread da interface do usuário principal não é possível atualizar o conteúdo de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>que foi criado no thread da interface do usuário.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: In order for the background thread to access the content property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, the background thread must delegate the work to the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> associated with the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: Para que o thread em segundo plano acessar a propriedade content a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, thread em segundo plano deve delegar o trabalho para o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>associado ao thread de interface do usuário.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: This is accomplished by using either <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Isso é feito por meio de um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> is synchronous and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> is asynchronous.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A>é síncrono e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>é assíncrona.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A></xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: The operation is added to the event queue of the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> at the specified <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>.
trans-unit.target: A operação é adicionada à fila de eventos de <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>em especificado <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>

trans-unit.source: If multiple <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> calls are made at the same <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>, they will be executed in the order the calls were made.
trans-unit.target: Se vários <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>as chamadas são feitas no mesmo <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority>, elas serão executadas na ordem em que as chamadas feitas.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> is called on a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> that has shut down, the status property of the returned <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>for chamado em um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>que foi desligado, a propriedade status da retornado <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation>é definida como <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus>.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initiates shutdown of the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref> asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Inicia o desligamento do <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"> </xref> assincronamente.

trans-unit.source: BeginInvokeShutdown demands unrestricted UI Permissions.
trans-unit.target: BeginInvokeShutdown exige permissões irrestritas de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> starts to shut down, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownStarted> event is raised and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownStarted%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>começa a ser desligada, o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownStarted>é gerado e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownStarted%2A>é definido como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownStarted%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownStarted> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> does not shut down completely until the event queue unwinds.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>não desligar completamente até que a fila de eventos esvazia.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>

trans-unit.source: When the Dispatcher finishes shutting down, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownFinished> event is raised and the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownFinished%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Quando o Dispatcher termina sendo desligado, o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownFinished>é gerado e o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownFinished%2A>está definida como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownFinished%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownFinished>

trans-unit.source: Once the shutdown process begins, all pending work items in the queue are aborted.
trans-unit.target: Quando começar o processo de desligamento, trabalho pendente itens na fila de anulação.

trans-unit.source: The priority at which to begin shutting down the dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: A prioridade no qual começar a desligar o dispatcher.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the calling thread is the thread associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o thread de chamada é o thread associado a esta <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Only the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> that a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> is created on may access the object.
trans-unit.target: Somente o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>que um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>é criado na pode acessar o objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> to access the object from a different thread.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>para acessar o objeto de um thread diferente.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: CheckAccess can be called from any thread.
trans-unit.target: CheckAccess pode ser chamado de qualquer thread.

trans-unit.source: The difference between CheckAccess and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.VerifyAccess%2A> is CheckAccess returns a Boolean indicating whether the calling thread has access to the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.VerifyAccess%2A> throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: A diferença entre CheckAccess e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.VerifyAccess%2A>é CheckAccess retorna um valor booleano que indica se o thread de chamada tem acesso para o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.VerifyAccess%2A>lança uma exceção.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.VerifyAccess%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.VerifyAccess%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the calling thread is the thread associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o thread de chamada é o thread associado a esta <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref> for the thread currently executing and creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref> if one is not already associated with the thread.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"> </xref> para o thread em execução no momento e cria um novo <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"> </xref> se um não estiver associado ao thread.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is not associated with the current thread, a new <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> will be created.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>não está associado com o segmento atual, um novo <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>será criado.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>

trans-unit.source: This is not the case with the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.FromThread%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Isso não é o caso com o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.FromThread%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.FromThread%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.FromThread%2A> will return `null` if there is not a dispatcher associated with the specified thread.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.FromThread%2A>retornará `null` se não houver um dispatcher associado ao segmento especificado.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.FromThread%2A>

trans-unit.source: The dispatcher associated with the current thread.
trans-unit.target: O distribuidor associado ao segmento atual.

trans-unit.source: Disables processing of the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref> queue.
trans-unit.target: Desabilita o processamento do <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"> </xref> fila.

trans-unit.source: Disabling dispatcher processing is an advanced method that is intended to eliminate the chance of unrelated reentrancy.
trans-unit.target: Desabilitar o processamento do dispatcher é um método avançado que é destinado para eliminar a chance de reentrância não relacionada.

trans-unit.source: The effects of disabling processing are as follows: - [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr#initcap](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-clrsharpinitcap-md.md)] locks will not pump messages internally.
trans-unit.target: Os efeitos de desabilitar o processamento são os seguintes:- [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr#initcap](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-clrsharpinitcap-md.md)] bloqueios não bomba mensagens internamente.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame> objects are not allowed to be pushed.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame>objetos não podem ser enviados por push.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame>

trans-unit.source: - Message processing is not permitted.
trans-unit.target: -Processamento de mensagens não é permitido.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled> structure that DisableProcessing returns when it is called can be used to re-enable dispatcher processing.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled>estrutura DisableProcessing retorna quando ele é chamado pode ser usada para reabilitar o processamento do dispatcher.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled>

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled.Dispose%2A> on the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled> structure re-enables processing.
trans-unit.target: Chamando <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled.Dispose%2A>no <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled>estrutura habilita novamente o processamento.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherProcessingDisabled.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: DisableProcessing can only be called on the thread the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: DisableProcessing só pode ser chamado no thread de <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>está associado.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>

trans-unit.source: A structure used to re-enable dispatcher processing.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura usada para habilitar novamente o processamento do dispatcher.

trans-unit.source: Requests that all frames exit, including nested frames.
trans-unit.target: Solicitações que sair de todos os quadros, incluindo quadros aninhados.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref> for the specified thread.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"> </xref> para o segmento especificado.

trans-unit.source: If a dispatcher is not available for the specified thread, `null` will be returned.
trans-unit.target: Se um distribuidor não está disponível para o segmento especificado, `null` será retornado.

trans-unit.source: FromThread does not create a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> on a thread that does not have a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>.
trans-unit.target: FromThread não criar um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>em um thread que não tem um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is created on a thread that does not already have a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> when attempting to get the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> by using the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CurrentDispatcher%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>é criado em um thread que ainda não tiver um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>ao tentar obter o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>usando o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CurrentDispatcher%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CurrentDispatcher%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>

trans-unit.source: The thread to obtain the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref> from.
trans-unit.target: O thread para obter o <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"> </xref> do.

trans-unit.source: The dispatcher for thread.
trans-unit.target: O dispatcher para thread .

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref> has finished shutting down.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"> </xref> terminou de desligar.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> starts to shut down, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownStarted> event is raised and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownStarted%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>começa a ser desligada, o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownStarted>é gerado e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownStarted%2A>é definido como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownStarted%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownStarted> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> does not shutdown completely until the event queue unwinds.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>não encerra completamente até que a fila de eventos esvazia.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>

trans-unit.source: When the Dispatcher finishes shutting down, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownFinished> event is raised and the HasShutdownFinished property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Quando o Dispatcher termina sendo desligado, o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownFinished>é gerado e a propriedade HasShutdownFinished está definida como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownFinished>

trans-unit.source: Once the shutdown process begins, all pending work items in the queue are aborted.
trans-unit.target: Quando começar o processo de desligamento, trabalho pendente itens na fila de anulação.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the dispatcher has finished shutting down; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o dispatcher concluiu a desligar; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of hooks that provide additional event information about the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de conexões que fornecem informações de evento adicionais sobre o <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherHooks> class provides additional event information about the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>, such as when the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is inactive or when an operation has competed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherHooks>classe fornece informações de evento adicionais sobre o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>, como quando o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>está inativo ou quando uma operação ser concluída.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherHooks>

trans-unit.target: A prioridade determina em qual ordem o retorno de chamada especificado é invocado em relação a outras operações pendentes no <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Executa o delegado especificado com os argumentos especificados de forma síncrona no thread de <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"> </xref> está associado.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], only the thread that created a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> may access that object.
trans-unit.target: Em [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], somente o thread que criou um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>pode acessar esse objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>

trans-unit.source: For example, a background thread that is spun off from the main UI thread cannot update the contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> that was created on the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um thread em segundo plano que é será levado do thread da interface do usuário principal não é possível atualizar o conteúdo de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>que foi criado no thread da interface do usuário.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: In order for the background thread to access the Content property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, the background thread must delegate the work to the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> associated with the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: Para que o thread em segundo plano acessar a propriedade Content a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, thread em segundo plano deve delegar o trabalho para o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>associado ao thread de interface do usuário.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: Executes the specified delegate at the specified priority with the specified arguments synchronously on the thread the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Executa o delegado especificado na prioridade especificada com os argumentos especificados de forma síncrona no thread de <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"> </xref> está associado.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], only the thread that created a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> may access that object.
trans-unit.target: Em [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], somente o thread que criou um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>pode acessar esse objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>

trans-unit.source: For example, a background thread that is spun off from the main UI thread cannot update the contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> that was created on the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um thread em segundo plano que é será levado do thread da interface do usuário principal não é possível atualizar o conteúdo de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>que foi criado no thread da interface do usuário.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: In order for the background thread to access the Content property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, the background thread must delegate the work to the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> associated with the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: Para que o thread em segundo plano acessar a propriedade Content a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, thread em segundo plano deve delegar o trabalho para o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>associado ao thread de interface do usuário.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: For example, a background thread that is spun off from the main UI thread cannot update the contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> that was created on the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um thread em segundo plano que é será levado do thread da interface do usuário principal não é possível atualizar o conteúdo de um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>que foi criado no thread da interface do usuário.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: In order for the background thread to access the Content property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, the background thread must delegate the work to the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> associated with the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: Para que o thread em segundo plano acessar a propriedade Content a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, thread em segundo plano deve delegar o trabalho para o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>associado ao thread de interface do usuário.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: This is accomplished by using either <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Initiates the shutdown process of the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref> synchronously.
trans-unit.target: Inicia o processo de desligamento do <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"> </xref> sincronicamente.

trans-unit.source: InvokeShutdown demands unrestricted UI Permissions.
trans-unit.target: InvokeShutdown exige permissões irrestritas de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> starts to shut down, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownStarted> event is raised and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownStarted%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>começa a ser desligada, o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownStarted>é gerado e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownStarted%2A>é definido como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownStarted%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownStarted> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> does not shut down completely until the event queue unwinds.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>não desligar completamente até que a fila de eventos esvazia.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>

trans-unit.source: When the Dispatcher finishes shutting down, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownFinished> event is raised and the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownFinished%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Quando o Dispatcher termina sendo desligado, o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownFinished>é gerado e o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownFinished%2A>está definida como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownFinished%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownFinished>

trans-unit.source: Once the shutdown process begins, all pending work items in the queue are aborted.
trans-unit.target: Quando começar o processo de desligamento, trabalho pendente itens na fila de anulação.

trans-unit.source: Enters an execute loop.
trans-unit.target: Insere um loop de execução.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame> represents a loop that processes pending work items.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame>representa um loop que processa os itens de trabalho pendentes.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame>

trans-unit.source: The Dispatcher processes the work item queue in a loop.
trans-unit.target: O Dispatcher processa a fila de itens de trabalho em um loop.

trans-unit.source: The loop is referred to as a frame.
trans-unit.target: O loop é conhecido como um quadro.

trans-unit.source: The initial loop is typically initiated by the application by calling <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Run%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O loop inicial é iniciado normalmente pelo aplicativo chamando <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Run%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Run%2A>

trans-unit.source: PushFrame enters a loop represented by the parameter `frame`.
trans-unit.target: PushFrame inserirá um loop representado pelo parâmetro `frame`.

trans-unit.source: At each iteration of the loop, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> will check the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame.Continue%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame> class to determine whether the loop should continue or if it should stop.
trans-unit.target: Em cada iteração do loop, o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>verificará o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame.Continue%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame>classe para determinar se o loop deve continuar ou se deve parar.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame.Continue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame> allows for the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame.Continue%2A> property to be set explicitly and it respects the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownStarted%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame>permite que a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame.Continue%2A>propriedade a ser definida explicitamente e respeita a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownStarted%2A>propriedade em <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownStarted%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame.Continue%2A></xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame>

trans-unit.source: This means when the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> starts to shut down, frames that use the default <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame> implementation will exit, which enables all nested frames to exit.
trans-unit.target: Isso significa que, quando o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>começa a fechar, quadros que usam o padrão <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame>implementação será fechado, que permite aninhados todos os quadros sair.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherFrame> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>

trans-unit.source: The frame for the dispatcher to process.
trans-unit.target: O quadro para o distribuidor processar.

trans-unit.target: frameis .

trans-unit.source: is -or- frame is running on a different .
trans-unit.target: is -or- frame is running on a different .

trans-unit.source: -or- Dispatcher processing has been disabled.
trans-unit.target: - ou - processamento do Dispatcher foi desabilitado.

trans-unit.source: Pushes the main execution frame on the event queue of the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Envia o quadro de execução principal na fila de eventos de <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> processes the event queue in a loop.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>processa a fila de eventos em um loop.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>

trans-unit.source: The loop is referred to as a frame.
trans-unit.target: O loop é conhecido como um quadro.

trans-unit.source: The initial loop is typically initiated by the application by calling Run.
trans-unit.target: O loop inicial é iniciado normalmente pelo aplicativo chamando a execução.

trans-unit.source: The main execution frame will continue until the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is shutdown.
trans-unit.target: O quadro de execução principal continuará até que o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>é desligado.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref> finishes shutting down.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"> </xref> termina sendo desligado.

trans-unit.source: When the shutdown process of a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is started, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownStarted> event is raised and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownStarted%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Quando o processo de desligamento de um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>é iniciado, o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownStarted>é gerado e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownStarted%2A>é definido como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownStarted%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownStarted> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> does not shutdown completely until the event queue unwinds.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>não encerra completamente até que a fila de eventos esvazia.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>

trans-unit.source: When the Dispatcher finishes shutting down, the ShutdownFinished event is raised and the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownFinished%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Quando o Dispatcher termina sendo desligado, o evento ShutdownFinished é gerado e o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownFinished%2A>está definida como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownFinished%2A>

trans-unit.source: Once the shutdown process begins, all pending work items in the queue are aborted.
trans-unit.target: Quando começar o processo de desligamento, trabalho pendente itens na fila de anulação.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref> begins to shut down.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"> </xref> começa a fechar.

trans-unit.source: When the shutdown process of a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is started, the ShutdownStarted event is raised and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownStarted%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Quando o processo de desligamento de um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>é iniciado, o evento ShutdownStarted é gerado e <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownStarted%2A>é definido como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownStarted%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> does not shutdown completely until the event queue unwinds.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>não encerra completamente até que a fila de eventos esvazia.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>

trans-unit.source: When the Dispatcher finishes shutting down, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownFinished> event is raised and the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownFinished%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Quando o Dispatcher termina sendo desligado, o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownFinished>é gerado e o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownFinished%2A>está definida como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.HasShutdownFinished%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.ShutdownFinished>

trans-unit.source: Once the shutdown process begins, all pending work items in the queue are aborted.
trans-unit.target: Quando começar o processo de desligamento, trabalho pendente itens na fila de anulação.

trans-unit.target: Obtém o segmento isso <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"> </xref> está associado.

trans-unit.source: The thread.
trans-unit.target: O thread.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a thread exception is thrown and uncaught during execution of a delegate by way of <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke*> or <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke*>.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma exceção de thread é gerada e não capturada durante a execução de um delegado por meio de <> </> *> ou <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when an exception that was thrown during execution of a delegate by way of <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> is uncaught.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento é gerado quando uma exceção foi lançada durante a execução de um delegado por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>é não percebida.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: A handler can mark the exception as handled, which will prevent the internal exception handler from being called.
trans-unit.target: Um manipulador pode marcar a exceção tratados, que impedirá que o manipulador de exceção interna do que está sendo chamado.

trans-unit.source: Event handlers for this event must be written with care to avoid creating secondary exceptions and to catch any that occur.
trans-unit.target: Manipuladores de eventos para esse evento devem ser escritos com cuidado para evitar criar exceções secundárias e identificar os que ocorrem.

trans-unit.source: It is recommended to avoid allocating memory or doing any resource intensive operations in the handler.
trans-unit.target: É recomendável para evitar a alocação de memória ou fazer qualquer recurso operações intensivas no manipulador.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter> event provides a means to not raise the UnhandledException event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter>evento fornece um meio para não gerar o evento UnhandledException.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter> event is raised first, and If <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs.RequestCatch%2A> on the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs> is set to `false`, the UnhandledException event will not be raised.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter>é gerado pela primeira vez e se <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs.RequestCatch%2A>no <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs>é definido como `false`, o evento UnhandledException não será gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs.RequestCatch%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a thread exception is thrown and uncaught during execution of a delegate by way of <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke*> or <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke*> when in the filter stage.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma exceção de thread é gerada e não capturada durante a execução de um delegado por meio de <> </> *> ou <> </> *> quando no estágio de filtro.

trans-unit.source: This event is raised during the filter stage for an exception that is raised during execution of a delegate by way of <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> and is uncaught.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento é gerado durante o estágio de filtro para uma exceção gerada durante a execução de um delegado por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>e não detectadas.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: The call stack is not unwound at this point (first-chance exception).
trans-unit.target: A pilha de chamadas não é organizada neste momento (exceção de primeira chance).

trans-unit.source: Event handlers for this event must be written with care to avoid creating secondary exceptions and to catch any that occur.
trans-unit.target: Manipuladores de eventos para esse evento devem ser escritos com cuidado para evitar criar exceções secundárias e identificar os que ocorrem.

trans-unit.source: It is recommended to avoid allocating memory or doing any resource intensive operations in the handler.
trans-unit.target: É recomendável para evitar a alocação de memória ou fazer qualquer recurso operações intensivas no manipulador.

trans-unit.source: The UnhandledExceptionFilter event provides a means to not raise the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException> event.
trans-unit.target: O evento UnhandledExceptionFilter fornece um meio para não gerar o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException>

trans-unit.source: The UnhandledExceptionFilter event is raised first, and If <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs.RequestCatch%2A> on the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs> is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException> event will not be raised.
trans-unit.target: O evento UnhandledExceptionFilter é gerado pela primeira vez e se <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs.RequestCatch%2A>no <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs>é definido como `false`, o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException>evento não será gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs.RequestCatch%2A>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the calling thread has access to this <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o thread de chamada tem acesso a esse <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Only the thread the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> is created on may access the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>.
trans-unit.target: Somente o thread de <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>é criado na pode acessar <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>

trans-unit.source: This method is public; therefore, any thread can check to see whether it has access to the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é público; Portanto, qualquer thread pode verificar se ele tem acesso a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>

trans-unit.source: The difference between <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CheckAccess%2A> and VerifyAccess is <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CheckAccess%2A> returns a Boolean if the calling thread does not have access to the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> and VerifyAccess throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: A diferença entre <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CheckAccess%2A>e VerifyAccess é <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CheckAccess%2A>retorna um valor booleano, se o thread de chamada não tem acesso para o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>e VerifyAccess lança uma exceção.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CheckAccess%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CheckAccess%2A>

trans-unit.source: The calling thread does not have access to this <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O thread de chamada não tem acesso a esse <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates an awaitable object that asynchronously yields control back to the current dispatcher and provides an opportunity for the dispatcher to process other events.
trans-unit.target: Cria um objeto aguardável que produz o controle volta para o dispatcher atual e fornece uma oportunidade para o distribuidor processar outros eventos de forma assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: This method provides a way for you to temporarily release execution control to the current dispatcher so it can do other work, such as process other events.
trans-unit.target: Esse método fornece uma maneira para que você libere temporariamente o controle de execução para o dispatcher atual para que ele possa fazer outro trabalho, como processar outros eventos.

trans-unit.source: Use the `await`, or `Await` in Visual Basic, operator on the return value to return control to the current dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: Use o `await`, ou `Await` no Visual Basic, o operador em que o valor de retorno para retornar o controle para o dispatcher atual.

trans-unit.source: Use this method if want to give your app a chance to process events while you app is doing a lot of work on the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: Use este método se quiser que seu aplicativo tenha a oportunidade de processar eventos enquanto o aplicativo está fazendo uma grande parte do trabalho no thread da interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use this method in a long-running loop that updates a control.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode usar esse método em um loop de execução longa que atualiza um controle.

trans-unit.source: This method is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Yield%28System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority%29> method and passing in <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é equivalente a chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Yield%28System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority%29>método e passando <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Yield%28System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority%29>

trans-unit.target: Um objeto aguardável que produz o controle volta para o dispatcher atual e fornece uma oportunidade para o distribuidor processar outros eventos de forma assíncrona.

trans-unit.target: O trabalho que ocorre quando o controle retorna para o código aguardando o resultado deste método é agendado com a prioridade especificada.

trans-unit.target: Use o `await`, ou `Await` no Visual Basic, o operador em que o valor de retorno para retornar o controle para o dispatcher atual.

trans-unit.source: Use this method if want to give your app a chance to process events while you app is doing a lot of work on the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: Use este método se quiser que seu aplicativo tenha a oportunidade de processar eventos enquanto o aplicativo está fazendo uma grande parte do trabalho no thread da interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use this method in a long-running loop that updates a control.

trans-unit.source: The priority at which to schedule the continuation.
trans-unit.target: A prioridade de agendamento de continuação.
